item.title: Radix add a quote by Mario Puzo
item.description: "I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse." -- Mario Puzo

item.title: Radix add a quote by Orhan Pamuk
item.description: "I am nothing but a corpse now, a body at the bottom of a well. " -- Orhan Pamuk

item.title: Radix add a quote by Orhan Pamuk
item.description: "I don't want to be a tree; I want to be its meaning." -- Orhan Pamuk

item.title: Radix add a quote by Orhan Pamuk
item.description: "Painting is the silence of thought and the music of sight." -- Orhan Pamuk

item.title: Radix add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Radix add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Radix add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Radix add a quote by Thomas Fuller
item.description: "It is said that the darkest hour of the night comes just before the dawn." -- Thomas Fuller

item.title: Radix add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Radix add a quote by pramoedya ananta toer
item.description: "Dalam hidup kita, cuma satu yang kita punya, yaitu keberanian. Kalau tidak punya itu, lantas apa harga hidup kita ini?" -- pramoedya ananta toer

item.title: Radix add a quote by pramoedya
item.description: "Duniaku bukan jabatan, pangkat, gaji, dan kecurangan. Duniaku bumi manusia dengan persoalannya" -- pramoedya

item.title: Radix add a quote by Bumi manusia-Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Berbahagialah dia yang makan dari keringatnya sendiri, bersuka karena usahanya sendiri, dan maju karena pengalamannya sendiri." -- Bumi manusia-Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Radix add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "seorang terpelajar harus sudah berbuat adil sejak dalam pikiran apalagi dalam perbuatan" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Radix add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Power resides only where men believe it resides. [...] A shadow on the wall, yet shadows can kill. And ofttimes a very small man can cast a very large shadow." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Radix add a quote by George R.R. Martin
Radix add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Radix add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Crowns do queer things to the heads beneath them." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Radix add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "We are the local embodiment of a Cosmos grown to self-awareness. We have begun to contemplate our origins: starstuff pondering the stars; organized assemblages of ten billion billion billion atoms considering the evolution of atoms; tracing the long journey by which, here at least, consciousness arose. Our loyalties are to the species and the planet. We speak for Earth. Our obligation to survive is owed not just to ourselves but also to that Cosmos, ancient and vast, from which we spring." -- Carl Sagan
